name: Automated Video Translation & Distribution with DubLab to Multiple Platforms
description:
**Automated** n8n workflow: Receives videos via form, dubs/translates them to the selected languages, and‚Äîupon completion‚Äîuploads them to multiple social media channels and cloud drives, including Box, Dropbox, and YouTube, Telegram, Postiz (Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok, Reddit etc.)

### Workflows
----------
 1. Via n8n form select files to dub for desired languages.
 2. Listen webhook and whenever dubbing finishes upload to desired platforms

### Used Stacks
-------------
 - DubLab App (ApiKey, Webhook Setup Required)
#### Optional (Upload)
 - Telegram (Token Required)
 - Box (Oauth2 Required)
 - Dropbox (Oauth2 Required)
 - Youtube (Oauth2 Required)
 - Postiz (ApiKey Required)

workflow.name: DubLab App Video Dubbing and Translate

parameters.content:
## Dub Videos And Share on Social Media

### Workflows
----------
 1. Via n8n form select files to dub for desired languages.
 2. Listen webhook and whenever dubbing finishes upload to desired platforms

### Used Stacks
-------------
 - DubLab App (ApiKey, Webhook Setup Required)
 - Telegram (Token Required)
 - Box (Oauth2 Required)
 - Dropbox (Oauth2 Required)
 - Youtube (Oauth2 Required)
 - Postiz (ApiKey Required)

## How to Use

 - Obtain Api Key from https://dublab.app, set as variable or just update on nodes.
 - Grab Webhook Url and add to DubLab App
 - Setup upload providers (Telegram, Box, Dropbox, YouTube, Postiz etc.)

### Postiz
 - https://postiz.com/
 - Pretty neat tool which supports many social media platforms
 - Supports cloud and self-hosted version
 - Via API post can be shared over below platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Threads, Tiktok, Reddit etc.)
